mapper.sql: t.id, t.patient_record_id, t.diag_code, t.diag_name, t.diag_date, t.diag_type_code, t.last_update_dtime
mapper.delete: delete from patient_diag where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into patient_diag ( patient_record_id, diag_code, diag_name, diag_date, diag_type_code, last_update_dtime ) values( #{patientRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{diagTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update patient_diag set patient_record_id = #{patientRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diag_code = #{diagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diag_name = #{diagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diag_date = #{diagDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, diag_type_code = #{diagTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dtime = #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
